name: Arlindo Cruz
description: '''Arlindo Domingos da Cruz Filho''' [[Ordem do Mérito Cultural|OMC]] (14 September 1958 – 8 August 2025) was a Brazilian musician and songwriter, working in the genre of [[samba]] and [[pagode]]. Cruz took part in the most important formation of [[Grupo Fundo de Quintal]], and was considered{{by whom?|date=February 2024}} one of the most important figures of the pagode movement.
